meanings.definition: Made by weaving with the hands.
meanings.sent1: The handwoven blanket felt soft and cozy.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate patterns of the handwoven rug.
meanings.sent3: The handwoven scarf was so warm, it made the snow jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her handwoven basket held memories like threads of time.
meanings.sent5: The handwoven tapestry told a story in every thread.

meanings.sent1: The handwoven fabric had a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: They proudly displayed the handwoven tablecloth at dinner.
meanings.sent3: The handwoven hat made him look like a stylish wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her handwoven necklace was a symbol of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The handwoven hammock gently swayed in the breeze.
